title: Chloe Sims and Pete Wicks are VERY worse for wear
text:
She revealed she's been on a date with Pamela Anderson's ex Adil Rami and is planning a second.

But Chloe Sims, 36, was pictured looking VERY worse for wear as she left the Elbrook Cash and Carry Charity Gala Dinner at Surrey's CHAK 89 on Thursday alongside her 'soulmate' Pete Wicks, 30.

With their arms around one another, the pair who say they 'love each other' but aren't in a romance, looked like they might be nursing sore heads in the morning.

The Only Way Is Berocca: Chloe Sims and Pete Wicks were VERY worse for wear as they left the Elbrook Cash and Carry Charity Gala Dinner at Surrey's CHAK 89 on Thursday

Oh dear: The couple appeared rather dishevelled as they made their way out of the party

Chloe looked stunning in her black satin dress as she was pictured leaving the hotspot with her TOWIE co-star.

And Pete couldn't help but giggle as Chloe put her arm around him to lean on him and steady herself as she made her way to her waiting car.

She let slip that she enjoyed her first date with Pammie's ex, 33, at London celeb hotspot Chiltern Firehouse earlier this month, with the footballer flying in from France just to see her.

There for her: Chloe threw her arms around Pete as she steadied herself while leaving the venue

Wait for me: She reached out to hold Pete's hand as their night came to a close

Cute moment: Earlier, while enjoying cocktails, Chloe ran her hands through Pete's hair

Into each other? The friends posed for lots of close pictures together

A moment: Pete tenderly placed two fingers on Chloe's wrist

Gone a little too far? Chloe looked like she was clutching onto a glass of water as she left the party

And Chloe has revealed she and Adil are set to go on their second date in the coming weeks after he slid into her DMs.

Speaking exclusively to MailOnline, theTOWIE star branded her 'beautiful' love interest a 'gentleman' and jokingly declared she no longer needs dating apps to pursue relationships.

On their glitzy first date, TV personality Chloe enthused: 'We had a really nice date. It was a perfect date.' He was a gentlemen and we are going to be seeing each other again in a few weeks. He was beautiful in person. We've been speaking for a while.

Blossoming: Chloe (pictured left on Thursday) also revealed she and Adil Rami are set to go on their second date in the coming weeks after he slid into her DMs

First date: Speaking to MailOnline at the Elbrook Cash and Carry Charity Gala Dinner in Surrey on Thursday, the TOWIE star branded her love interest a 'gentleman' (pictured together earlier this month)

'If you met him, you’d be like, "Wow".'

The reality star went on to reveal she's looking forward to their second date in a few weeks, when she wraps up filming the latest edition of The Only Way Is Essex.

The blonde bombshell explained: 'We’ll see each other again when I finish filming and I’m hoping the second date will be as good as the first.

Future prospects: 'He DM'd me, you don't need dating apps!' she jokingly declared

Moving on: Chloe was left heartbroken when her TOWIE co-star Dan Edgar went crawling back to his ex, Amber Turner (pictured together earlier this month)

Former couple: The French sportsman had an acrimonious, highly-publicised split from Baywatch actress Pamela, 52, this summer

'He DM’d me. You don’t need these dating apps!'

During their date earlier this month, the social media sensation kept a low profile upon leaving the venue with the French sportsman, who had an acrimonious, highly-publicised split from Baywatch actress Pamela, 52, this summer.

Chloe recently faced heartbreak when her co-star Dan Edgar went crawling back to his ex, Amber Turner.

But it seems the Celebs Go Dating star has put their split firmly behind her as she focuses her attention on hunky Adil.

In awe: On their glitzy first date, TV personality Chloe enthused: 'We had a really nice date. It was a perfect date'

Exciting: The star revealed she's looking forward to their second date in a few weeks, when she wraps up filming the latest edition of The Only Way Is Essex (pictured with sister Demi)

What's next? During her time at the Mitcham event, where she was joined Demi, 22, and BFF Pete Wicks, 30, Chloe also discussed her future plans after her stint on TOWIE comes to an end

Pals: The blonde dazzled in a black gown with a thigh-high slit as she cosied up to her longtime friend Pete

During her time at the Mitcham event, where she was joined by sister Demi, 22, and BFF Pete Wicks, 30, Chloe also discussed her future plans after her stint on TOWIE comes to an end.

The TV star told MailOnline: 'I think the difference with me and the other cast is that I am heading to 40. When the show ends, it’ll probably be the end of reality for me.

'For the others, they’re still young and probably hope to do more reality, I don’t know. For me, I’m getting older now and I do want to settle down. When it finishes, that’ll be the point in my life when I do settle down.

Cheery: Chloe and Pete appeared in great spirits as they chatted up a storm at the event

Come closer: The pair engaged in a very cosy conversation, where she was pictured holding his face at one point

'I don’t feel pressure to settle down, I actually want to. I think I’m at the point where I’m ready. I’m just going to enjoy TOWIE while it lasts.'

Admitting she's loosely planned her 40th birthday three years ahead, Chloe added: 'Me and Pete are having a joint birthday night out with all our friends and then I’ll have a separate family situation.'

The former glamour model went on to reveal she's set to launch her own YouTube channel, where she will be sharing the tips and tricks behind her stunning make-up looks.

Chloe elaborated: 'I’m launching my YouTube channel on Sunday. I’ve got a team of people helping me and that is my passion.

'I’m obsessed with beauty and make up and I’ve been getting asked so much from people saying, can you do a make up tutorial? Although I’ve been in front of cameras for nine years, that little camera freaks me out.

'I’m hoping it takes off because when TOWIE is finished, that’s what I would like to pursue.'
description: She revealed she's been on a date with Pamela Anderson's ex Adil Rami and is planning a second.
